sentence.Network_en: The Geminides originate from mysterious 3200 Phaethon , which is an asteroid.
sentence.Network_cn: 双子座流星雨是由神秘的第3200号小行星“非以颂”产生的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: phaeothamnionaceae 褐枝藻科, phaethon 法松, phaescolosaxin 植物血凝素

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) son of Helios; killed when trying to drive his father's chariot and came too close to earth

auth_sentence.content: The Geminids, though, are associated not with a comet but with a strange asteroid known as Phaethon.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Geminids, though, are associated not with a comet but with a strange asteroid known as Phaethon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Geminids, though, are associated not with a comet but with a strange asteroid known as Phaethon.

auth_sentence.content: In Greek mythology Phaethon was the son of the Sun god Helios, who borrowed his father's chariot to near-disastrous effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: In Greek mythology Phaethon was the son of the Sun god Helios, who borrowed his father's chariot to near-disastrous effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In Greek mythology Phaethon was the son of the Sun god Helios, who borrowed his father's chariot to near-disastrous effect.

auth_sentence.content: The orbit then takes Phaethon all the way out to the main asteroid belt, crossing the orbits of all four inner planets.
